title: Development of a natural language processing pipeline for assessment of cardiovascular risk in myeloproliferative neoplasms

abstract: A central feature of myeloproliferative neoplasms (MPN) is an increased risk of cardiovascular thrombotic complications, and this is the primary determinant for the introduction of cytoreductive therapy. 1 The landmark ECLAP study in polycythemia …

abstract: Background: Patients' online access to their medical records and secure messaging (SM) via patient portals are becoming increasingly prevalent on an international scale. SM offers a number of potential benefits, including enhanced health outcomes …
